anya-e0105n19:1_0: Ekacce pana marammaraṭṭhikā “ācariyabuddhaghoso marammaraṭṭhe sathuṁ nāma nagarato sīhaḷadīpaṁ gantvā saṅgahaṭṭhakathāyo akāsī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0105n19:1_3: telaṅgajātikā ca bahū janā marammaraṭṭhe ca indocina raṭṭhe ca gantvā vasanti, talhiṅa?
anya-e0105n19:1_4: Iti vohāro ca tatoyeva telaṅgapadato uppanno.
anya-e0105n19:1_5: Tathā ‘buddhaghoso aṭṭhakathāyo katvā sīhaḷadīpato marammaraṭṭhaṁ gantvā pacchimabhāge tattheva vasī’tipi gahetuṁ sakkā,
anya-e0105n19:1_6: tassa hi ganthā marammaraṭṭhe sīhaḷaraṭṭhatopi surakkhitatarā hontī”ti ca vatvā patiṭṭhāpitaṁ.
